title: Driver satisfaction with Uber U.S. 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest Share of respondents for Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Strongly disagree.
Response Somewhat agree and Strongly agree had the biggest gap of 300.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2017.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Response Somewhat agree is the maximum Share of respondents and Strongly disagree is the minimum Share of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
For Response Somewhat agree, 2018 had the highest Share of respondents 434.0 among the 3 groups and in Strongly disagree, 2018 had the lowest Share of respondents 82.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Responses on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 3 groups, 2018 had the highest Share of respondents for Response Somewhat agree and 2018 had the lowest Share of respondents for Response Strongly disagree.
Response Somewhat agree and Strongly agree had the biggest gap of 300.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2017.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Response Somewhat agree is the maximum Share of respondents and Strongly disagree is the minimum Share of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Responses for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Response Somewhat agree had the maximum Share of respondents among all 3 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Response Strongly disagree for 2018.
For Response Somewhat agree, 2017 had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Response Strongly agree out of all 5 Responses.
Response Somewhat agree and Strongly agree had the biggest gap of 300.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for 2017.
Among all 3 groups, 2018 had the gap of 352.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Response Somewhat agree and Strongly disagree respectively.

2018 had the maximum Share of respondents out of all 3 groups in Response Somewhat agree followed by 2018 in Somewhat agree, and the minimum Share of respondents is found for 2018 in Strongly disagree.
Averaging all 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019, the Response Somewhat agree is the maximum Share of respondents and Strongly disagree is the minimum Share of respondents.
